author: bloritsch
msg: minor changes to get figures to build properly--hack only works on command line.

author: donaldp
msg: Update the Installer to the new deployment format.
The only files in SAR-INF/ that will be extracted to file system are config.xml and server.xml. The remainder are used via the sar: protocol handler. All files outside SAR-INF/ will be extracted.

The old format is still supported but will generate warning messages. It is expected that the new format will support all our needs. It is also expected that the need to name block archives as .bars is not worth the addec complexit.
